mapper.sql: id, author, create_time, delete_time, id_delete, updateTime, updater, endTime, startTime, title
mapper.select: select * from giveHomework where title like #{homeworkname} or (startTime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}) and id_delete = 0
mapper.insert: insert into giveHomework (id, author, create_time, delete_time, id_delete, updateTime, updater, endTime, startTime, title, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
